subject: Dear Sir/ma
body:
Dear Sir/ma
Good day, I write to you that we can benefit from this  lucrative
business of mine.
I am Mr Martin Mwale Tembo a  Zambian national  until the upturn in
our presidential election which went against  our ruling party and our
presidential candidate Edgar Lungu who was an incumbent Lost to
Hakainde Hichilema of United party for National Development.
Ever since they won and were sworn in all us who are top government
officials have been witch haunted and that made some other officials
go into hiding in a nearby country in west Africa.
Every asset I have has been seized and all my accounts frozen  both
local and overseas.
But I have some money which was deposited in a security company
somewhere in Africa too which I will want you to help me secure for
the future of my children .
Please help because I will not be hiding forever and don't want my
family to suffer without anything.Once you are in possession of this
money I will hand myself in to face the law once and for all while you
handle the investment till my son is of age.
Awaiting to hear from you as quickly as possible so that i will give
you details on how you can retrieve the money
Mr Martin Mwale Tembo

subject: Re: Dear Sir/ma
body:
Hello Mr. Martin Mwale Tembo,

I hope this message finds you well. I'm sorry to hear about the difficult situation you're facing. It must be really tough for you and your family.

You mentioned a security company where some money is deposited. Could you please provide more details about this? How can I help in securing it for the future of your children?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Michelle
